<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_email"><sys_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><blind_copied/><body><html><head><style>
	#snc_notification_preference {
		text-decoration: none;
	}
	
	#snc_notification_unsubscribe {
		text-decoration: none;
	}
</style>

</head><body><p>A critical network incident was created.</p>
<p>Number: INC0010009<br>Priority: 1 - Critical<br>Category: Network<br>Link: <a id="snc_uri_ref_link" href="https://kura-labs-jul-4728-0017.lab.service-now.com/nav_to.do?uri=incident.do%3Fsys_id=36da75ee83c722107f44c85d50da1eb7%26sysparm_stack=incident_list.do%3Fsysparm_query=active=true">INC0010009</a></p>

<br><br>
